entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms and hail early this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 early this evening then light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. 40 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
